DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare insulin lispro low mixture ( 1 , 2 3 daily injection ) insulin glargine ( alone 1 , 2 3 insulin lispro daily injection ) lower blood sugar level
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Receiving oral antihyperglycemic medication ( include metformin ) without insulin injection last 90 day Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) equal great 7.0 % le 11.0 % Willing receive insulin injection continue take prestudy oral antihyperglycemic medication Able perform self monitor blood glucose Are take glucoselowering agent metformin , sulfonylurea Thiazolidinedione ( Pioglitazone ) Have take acarbose , miglitol , pramlintide , exenatide , repaglinide , nateglinide past 6 week , total 30 day , last 24 week Have body mass index great 35 kg/m2 History presence kidney disease Have cardiac disease ( Class III IV )
